int cimunit_thread_create ( cimunit_thread_t *RESTRICT  thread,
cimunit_task_entry_t  function,
void *RESTRICT  arg 
)

Create a new thread

Parameters:
thread- thread identifier of newly created thread
function- thread entry point
arg- argument to the thread

Definition at line 26 of file cimunit_thread_pthread.c.

{
  int result;

  pthread_attr_t attr;
  pthread_attr_init(&attr);
  pthread_attr_setdetachstate(&attr, PTHREAD_CREATE_JOINABLE);
  result = pthread_create(thread, &attr, function, arg);
  pthread_attr_destroy(&attr);

  return result;
}
